example_sentences: The sailors had to abandon the ship during the storm.
Many projects were abandoned due to lack of funding.
Regular exercise is beneficial to your health.
The new policy proved beneficial for small businesses.
The decision had serious consequences for the company.
As a consequence of his actions, he lost his job.
The experiment demonstrated the theory perfectly.
She demonstrated great skill in solving the problem.
Environmental issues are becoming increasingly important.
The company has implemented new environmental policies.
She has a very flexible approach to problem-solving.
The material is flexible enough to bend without breaking.
The new factory will generate hundreds of jobs.
His comments generated a lot of controversy.
The scientist proposed a new hypothesis to explain the phenomenon.
Their hypothesis was supported by the experimental results.
The government plans to implement new education reforms.
It's difficult to implement these changes without proper planning.
He published his research in a scientific journal.
She kept a daily journal during her travels.
